lemma Farkas'_Lemma: fixes cs :: "rat le_constraint set" assumes only_non_strict: "lec_rel ` cs \<subseteq> {Leq_Rel}" and fin: "finite cs" shows "(\<nexists> v. \<forall> c \<in> cs. v \<Turnstile>\<^sub>l\<^sub>e c) \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists> C const. (\<forall> (r, c) \<in> set C. r > 0 \<and> c \<in> cs) \<and> (\<Sum> (r,c) \<leftarrow> C. Leqc (r *R lec_poly c) (r *R lec_const c)) = Leqc 0 const \<and> const < 0)" (is "_ = ?rhs")
